sentences.sContent: watching monkeys in their natural habitat
sentences.sCn: 观察自然生活环境中的猴子

sentences.sContent: The grassland is an important habitat for many wild flowers.
sentences.sCn: 这片草原是很多野花的重要生长地。

remMethod.val: hab(生活， 居住) + it + at → 住的地方 → 栖息地

trans.tranOther: the natural home of a plant or animal
